div.h2: Update on School Closures and Distance Learning

div.span: Update on School Closures and Distance Learning

div.div: Update on School Closures and Distance Learning

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

span.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(40, 40, 40);

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;
p.span: THANK YOU to our incredible staff and community. The past few weeks have been overwhelming, and I am extremely grateful for the level of professionalism, support and calm demonstrated by all.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;
p.span: Today we deployed over 1300 computers to families who needed devices to connect to distance learning. We have fed students and gathered work to help students continue their academic goals. Families have been communicative and understanding as we tackle issues never-before faced. I am humbled by the outpouring of care and dedication of our staff, and our community has once again demonstrated significant fortitude.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;
margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;
p.span: Earlier today it was announced that four North Bay counties - Sonoma, Marin, Napa and Solano should prepare for school districts to continue distance learning through at least May 1, 2020. This guidance was based on consultation with surrounding county superintendents and the Sonoma County Health Officer, Dr. Sundari Mase.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: "Times New Roman", serif;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

strong.span: The Cotati-Rohnert Park Unified School District will abide by the Sonoma County Superintendents recommendation and remain closed until May 1. Distance learning will continue until further notice.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

img.p: We are in continuous communication with Sonoma County school districts and the Sonoma County Office of Education and the Sonoma County Health Department and in mid-April we will reassess and hope to determine a date to resume in-person classes.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;
p.span: During this time, only school and district personnel who perform essential functions such as feeding children, providing childcare or ensuring business continuity are working at district facilities. All school district personnel are on-call to perform school support functions as identified in the Governors order.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;
p.span: Grab and Go student meals will be provided to all students 18 and under from 11 am 1 pm every school day except for weekends and holidays at Rancho Cotate High School, Technology Middle School and Lawrence Jones Middle School. The student MUST BE PRESENT to receive meals.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;
p.span: In addition to emailing you, we will continue to update our district website and social media outlets regularly. If you have any questions, please contact your principal.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;
p.span: Please, please continue to follow prevention and hygiene protocols, including:

li.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(65, 65, 65); background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

ul.li: If you are sick or mildly sick for any reason, stay home. Call your doctor if you are concerned and/or your symptoms worsen.

li.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(65, 65, 65); background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

ul.li: Symptoms to watch for include a fever over 100 degrees and respiratory illness such as cough or difficulty breathing.

li.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(65, 65, 65); background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

ul.li: Wash hands frequently for at least 20 seconds.

li.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(65, 65, 65); background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

ul.li: Stay 6 feet or more away from strangers and especially those who are ill.

li.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(65, 65, 65); background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

ul.li: Stop shaking hands with others to reduce the spread of germs.

li.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(65, 65, 65); background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

ul.li: Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth.

li.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; color: rgb(65, 65, 65); background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

ul.li: Sneeze and cough into a tissue or your sleeve; safely throw away used tissues.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;
p.span: We recognize the tremendous changes that are confronting families and we know that everyone is doing the best they can. While we have provided schoolwork for students, we know there is no substitute for classroom experience and the expertise a teacher brings. Please be kind to yourself and your students and consult regularly with your teacher(s). This is new to everyone and we will get through it.

p.style: margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; text-indent: 0.5in; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

margin: 0in 0in 0.0001pt; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Calibri, sans-serif; background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial;

hr.br:
3/25/2020
Estimadas familias de CRPUSD:
GRACIAS a nuestro increble personal y comunidad. Las ltimas semanas han sido abrumadoras, y estoy extremadamente agradecido por el nivel de profesionalismo, apoyo y calma demostrado por todos.
Hoy desplegamos ms de 1300 computadoras en familias que necesitaban dispositivos para conectarse al aprendizaje a distancia. Hemos alimentado a los estudiantes y hemos reunido trabajo para ayudarlos a continuar sus metas acadmicas. Las familias han sido comunicativas y comprensivas al abordar problemas nunca antes enfrentados. Me siento honrado por la gran cantidad de atencin y dedicacin de nuestro personal, y nuestra comunidad ha demostrado una vez ms una fortaleza significativa.
El da de hoy se anunci que cuatro condados de North Bay - Sonoma, Marin, Napa y Solano - deberan prepararse para que los distritos escolares continen el aprendizaje a distancia al menos hasta el 1 de mayo de 2020. Esta gua se bas en la consulta con los superintendentes del condado circundante y el condado de Sonoma Oficial de salud, Dr. Sundari Mase.
El Distrito Escolar Unificado Cotati-Rohnert Park cumplir con la recomendacin del Superintendente del Condado de Sonoma y permanecer cerrado hasta el 1 de mayo. La educacin a distancia continuar hasta nuevo aviso.
Estamos en comunicacin continua con los distritos escolares del Condado de Sonoma y la Oficina de Educacin del Condado de Sonoma y el Departamento de Salud del Condado de Sonoma y a mediados de abril volveremos a evaluar y esperamos determinar una fecha para reanudar las clases en persona.
Durante este tiempo, solo el personal de la escuela y el distrito que realiza funciones esenciales como alimentar a los nios, brindar cuidado infantil o garantizar la continuidad del negocio est trabajando en las instalaciones del distrito. Todo el personal del distrito escolar est de guardia para realizar funciones de apoyo escolar como se identifica en la orden del Gobernador.
Se proporcionarn comidas para estudiantes Grab and Go a todos los estudiantes de 18 aos y menores de 11 am a 1 pm todos los das escolares, excepto los fines de semana y feriados en la Escuela Secundaria Rancho Cotate, la Escuela Intermedia Technology y la Escuela Intermedia Lawrence Jones. El estudiante DEBE ESTAR PRESENTE para recibir comidas.
Adems de enviarle un correo electrnico, continuaremos actualizando nuestro sitio web del distrito y las redes sociales regularmente. Si tiene alguna pregunta, comunquese con su director.
Por favor, siga los protocolos de prevencin e higiene, que incluyen:
Si est enfermo o levemente enfermo por cualquier motivo, qudese en casa. Llame a su mdico si est preocupado y / o sus sntomas empeoran.
Los sntomas a tener en cuenta incluyen fiebre de ms de 100 grados y enfermedades respiratorias como tos o dificultad para respirar.
Lvese las manos con frecuencia durante al menos 20 segundos.
Mantngase a 6 pies o ms lejos de extraos y especialmente de aquellos que estn enfermos.
Deje de estrechar la mano de otras personas para reducir la propagacin de grmenes.
Evitar tocarse los ojos, la nariz y la boca.
Estornudar y toser en un pauelo de papel o en la manga; tirar de forma segura los pauelos usados.
Reconocemos los enormes cambios que enfrentan las familias y sabemos que todos estn haciendo lo mejor que pueden. Si bien hemos proporcionado tareas escolares para los estudiantes, sabemos que no hay sustituto para la experiencia en el aula y la experiencia que aporta un maestro. S amable contigo mismo y con tus alumnos y consulta regularmente con tu (s) maestro (s). Esto es nuevo para todos y lo superaremos.
Estar bien y mantenerse saludable.
Sinceramente,
Mike
Dr. Michael Watenpaugh
Superintendente interino
